Jet8_Dashboard

The site where Jet8 clients managed their social media campaigns. Here they could configurate everything about users, teams, budgets, assets, posts, shares, permissions, etc. It was a clean but deep web app build with AngularJS.

I’m a Barcelona based Front-end Developer.

I've worked in startups and advertisement agencies...
